Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
bouffant \bouffant\ adj. being puffed out; -- used mostly of hair style, and sometimes clothing; as, a bouffant hairdo; a bouffant skirt.
Syn: puffy. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC] ||
bouffant adj : being puffed out; used of hair style or clothing; "a bouffant skirt" [syn: {puffy}]
